content: There is no guarantee when the finalize method will be called, or the order in which the finalize method will be called for multiple objects.  If the JVM exits without performing garbage collection, the OS may free the objects, in which case the finalize method doesn't get called.
stemmed: there guarante final method call , order final method call multipl object . If jvm exit without perform garbag collect , OS may free object , case final method n't get call .
